alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 1:20PM MST until January 16 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first and second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Central Highlands. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 8 AM Wednesday to midnight MST Wednesday Night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
